Helping Mr. Ray

Meeting Mr. Ray

Mr. Ray is a virtual helper who will walk you through an adventure to choose the right product. By choosing the right product, you will save Mr. Ray and his friend from bad chemicals.

"Helping Mr. Ray" is an interactive ad designed by Humane Society International. We hope with this ad, you will understand more about animal cruelty and why you should join the non-animal testing movement.

90%

Animals being tested are not recorded in official documentations.

115 million

Animals are used each year in laboratories all around the world.

10 000

Animals are tested for every new pesticide chemical research.

Animal testing are still mandatory in some countries. Everything from your toothpaste to your washing detergent has been forcefully tested on animals. This is still a big problem, because animals are permanently damaged. Some animals are reused for multiple tests. There's nothing "humane" about forcefully injecting deadly chemicals into animals. They have the right to live just as much as we do.

HSI are working with many countries to find an alternative solution to animal testing. Until now, we’ve found many methods that are more effective and accurate compare to the traditional ways. We provide training in developing countries to help companies and government authorities transitioning to modern non-animal methods.

WHAT CAN YOU DO

Your support will be used for researching and developing alternatives to animal testing, rescuing animals in labs, and giving them a new home.
